alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 19 at 7:55AM MST until December 19 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, and Greer Grade. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 8 PM this evening to noon PST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon Sunday to 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy wet snow could lead to power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
